```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```

```{r}

data("nyc_airbnb")

nyc_airbnb <- nyc_airbnb %>% mutate(rating = review_scores_location / 2) %>% 
  select(neighbourhood_group, neighbourhood, price, room_type, lat, long, rating) %>% 
  filter(
    neighbourhood_group == "Manhattan",
    price %in% 100:500
  ) %>% drop_na(rating)

```
